column4: Description

column3: Customer Survey Execution Work Task Type
column4: The type of work task (e.g. host focus group session, issue questionnaire)

column3: Customer Survey Execution Work Task Description
column4: Description of the task performed, includes summary of activities as necessary

column3: Customer Survey Execution Work Task Work Products
column4: File of consolidated notes, forms and documents for the work task
Reference to associated documents (e.g. required legal disclosures for participants)

column3: Customer Survey Execution Work Task Result
column4: Details of the outcome or result of the work task - typically the captured survey response and any related feedback

column3: Customer Survey Execution Work Task Date-Time
column4: The date-time the customer survey execution

Customer Surveys: CR Customer Survey Procedure Instance Record
CR Customer Survey Procedure Instance Record
column4: The type or category of customer survey (e.g. questionnaire, in context solicitation, focus group)

Customer Surveys: CR Customer Survey Procedure Instance Record
column4: A description of the customer survey that clarifies the sought customer insights, survey mechanism and target reviewers

Customer Surveys: CR Customer Survey Procedure Instance Record
column4: Reference to the business unit responsible for the survey execution

Customer Surveys: CR Customer Survey Procedure Instance Record
column4: Details of the deployment set-up/configuration of the customer survey

Customer Surveys: CR Customer Survey Procedure Instance Record
column4: The customer survey version number used

Customer Surveys: CR Customer Survey Procedure Instance Record
column4: The customer survey processing schedule, covering survey definition, reviewer selection, survey execution and subsequent analysis. Note for some integrated surveys this can be an on-going activity that attempts provides a constant stream of feedback relating to specific activities/services rather than a specific event

Customer Surveys: CR Customer Survey Procedure Instance Record
column4: Inventory record of any consumables that are to be used in the execution of the customer survey

Customer Surveys: CR Customer Survey Procedure Instance Record
column4: The type of consumable item associated with the customer survey (e.g. questionnaire, participation incentive gift)

Customer Surveys: CR Customer Survey Procedure Instance Record
column4: The tracked inventory of the consumable item

Customer Surveys: CR Customer Survey Procedure Instance Record
column4: Key dates associated with the customer survey process (e.g. initiation date, version revision date, completion date)

Customer Surveys: CR Customer Survey Procedure Instance Record
column4: Value of the date type

Customer Surveys: CR Customer Survey Procedure Instance Record
column4: The result/impact of the customer survey (will include summary of customer survey activity, survey response data and survey findings presentation analysis)
Details the selection criteria used to identify candidate customer reviewers
Reference to the customer selected as a survey candidate

column3: Customer Survey Design Work Task Type
column4: The type of work task (e.g. research survey context, refine/trial questionnaire, develop supporting materials)

column3: Customer Survey Design Work Task Description
column4: Description of the survey development task performed

column3: Customer Survey Design Work Task Work Products
column4: File of consolidated notes, forms and documents for the work task

column3: Customer Survey Design Work Task Result
column4: Details of the outcome or result of the work task - specifically developed materials to be used in survey execution

column3: Customer Survey Procedure Survey Analysis Result
column4: The result customer survey which combines response details/statistics and associated analysis, commentary and derived insights
